	name="Guido" ##Guido di Gandolfo aka Guido di Palude founder of dynasty. Son of Gandolfo. Accused of nicking a pile of dough from the church of Reggio in 1032-1040. Conti di Reggio. Presumably given the title by Mathilda's father since it had been in the Canossa family beforehand and Bonifazio was known to favor the family. Dead before 10th April 1073. Married "Aldegarda" who were the mother of all his sons.

	name = "Desiderius" #Desiderius/Daufer, Lombard King of Italy (757-774) and Duke of Spoleto (758-759)
	dynasty = 1044053
	religion = catholic
	culture = lombard
	martial = 6        # Average - held out against Charlemagne for 8 months but ultimately lost
	diplomacy = 8      # Skilled at marriage alliances and papal negotiations
	intrigue = 8       # Excellent at complex political maneuvering and diplomatic games
	stewardship = 7    # Good administrator - 8th century was period of economic prosperity
	trait = ambitious  # Constantly sought to expand Lombard power and reunify the kingdom
	trait = deceitful  # Broke promises to the Pope about restoring papal towns after gaining support
	trait = stubborn   # "Promptly swore never to comply" when Charlemagne made demands
	trait = vengeful   # Sought revenge against Charlemagne after his daughter was repudiated
	disallow_random_traits = yes
	717.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	734.1.1 = {
		add_spouse = 190340
	}
	774.6.1 = {
		trait = devoted  # When exiled to abbey of Corbie, became a monk
	}
	777.1.1 = {
		death = {
			death_reason = death_old_age
		}
	}

	stewardship = 6

	trait = trusting     # His willingness to make alliances and compromises, sometimes to his detriment
	trait = fickle       # Repeatedly changed alliances between Pisa, Genova, and other powers as needed

	disallow_random_traits = yes

	mother = 235023

		birth = yes

		effect = {
			set_relation_lover = { reason = lover_history target = character:235161 }
		}
	}
	1321.1.1 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

	diplomacy = 4     # Poor diplomatic relations, frequently broke treaties
	intrigue = 7      # Skilled at political maneuvering and forming/breaking alliances
	stewardship = 5   # Adequate administrator but focused more on warfare
	trait = ambitious      # Constantly involved in territorial disputes and expansion
	trait = arbitrary      # Described as "tyrannical," frequently broke treaties and peace agreements
	trait = deceitful      # Made false alliances, consistently betrayed partners when convenient
	trait = wrathful       # Quick to break peace and resort to violence when crossed
	disallow_random_traits = yes
	father = 235193
	mother = 235151
	1150.1.1 = {
		birth=yes
	}
	1170.1.1 = {
		add_spouse=235000
	}
	1175.1.1 = {
		add_spouse=235001
	}
	1194.1.1 = {
		add_trait = excommunicated    # Excommunicated by the archbishop of Pisa for breaking peace
	}
	1198.1.1 = {
		death=yes
	}
}

He beats her and when they visit the court of Sordello Visconti in 1224 she falls in love with him. After their return to Veronia she is aided by her brothers to runaway to Sordello in 1226). Rizzardo gets aid from Mantova but falls captive against Ezzelini in 1230. Mantova demands that Rizzardo is restored in 1231. In july 1231 the rector of the Lombard league rules that Rizzardo has to be released. When Ezzelini fails to comply Mantova invades, defeating Ezzelini on the 27th of july 1232 forcing the release of Rizzardo. A peace treaty is signed in August 28. but in 1233 the war is back on and the Rizzardo makes gains. 1239 Rizzardo refuse to change sides to the ghibelines against the league. In feburary 1240 Ezzelini leaves the league for the imperial cause. Died in Brescia during february 1254.
